subsection.name: What is the Marketplace?
subsection.p: The Bloomreach Forge Marketplace is an Essentials plugin that brings addon discovery directly into your brXM development environment. Browse, search, and get installation instructions for Forge addons without leaving the CMS.

ul.li: Browse Addons - Search and filter available Forge addons
Multi-Source Support - Aggregate addons from Forge, partners, and internal sources
Version Compatibility - See which addon versions work with your brXM version
Installation Guide - View step-by-step installation instructions

subsection.name: For Addon Developers
subsection.p: Publishing your addon to the Marketplace is simple:

ol.li: Set up the GitHub workflow for auto-generation
Release your addon - the descriptor is generated automatically

subsection.p: See Creating Descriptors for the complete guide.

subsection.name: For Platform Operators
subsection.p: Add custom addon sources to include partner or internal addons:

ul.li: Create a manifest file hosting your addon descriptors
Register the source via REST API or JCR configuration
Addons appear alongside Forge addons in the Marketplace
